content:
Prev: Kelsey scores run #7 Up: Hot Shots vs Blue Crew Next: Run #8?

Lindsey misses the plate



The ump called her back at the end of the play, but the Hot Shots misunderstood and
sent Sara instead, so this was the third out of the inning. The photo looks pretty clear:
the ump has a good line of sight, Lindsey's right foot is past the plate,and her left
is coming across but probably not touching.
Taken Monday, March 15, 2004, 06:55:45pm.  Original image size: 2048x2048, 7.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/50s @ F2.8, ISO 800, 28mm/F2.8 (45mm equiv)
PS7 CRW -0.15:0:50:60:3:25:25+M, Crop
